section.para: The dataset contains idnividual data of yearly acorn production of Holm oak (Quercus ilex) trees in 17 plots in Collserola from 1998 to 2012
The opportunity to collaborate on the project using the dataset

para.literalLayout: For details about methodology see:Espelta JM, Cortes P, Molowny-Horas R, Sánchez-Humanes B, Retana J. 2008. Masting mediated by summer drought reduces acorn predation in Mediterranean oak forests. Ecology, 89: 805-81Espelta JM, Bonal R, Sánchez-Humanes B. 2009. Pre-dispersal acorn predation in mixed oak forests: interspecific differences are driven by the interplay among seed phenology, seed size and predator size. Journal of Ecology, 97: 1416-1423Espelta JM, Cortés P, Molowny-Horas R, Retana J. 2009. Acorn crop size and pre-dispersal predation determine inter-specific differences in the recruitment success of two coexisting oaks. Oecologia, 161: 559-568

section.para:
For details about methodology see:
Espelta JM, Cortes P, Molowny-Horas R, Sánchez-Humanes B, Retana J. 2008. Masting mediated by summer drought reduces acorn predation in Mediterranean oak forests. Ecology, 89: 805-81
Espelta JM, Bonal R, Sánchez-Humanes B. 2009. Pre-dispersal acorn predation in mixed oak forests: interspecific differences are driven by the interplay among seed phenology, seed size and predator size. Journal of Ecology, 97: 1416-1423
Espelta JM, Cortés P, Molowny-Horas R, Retana J. 2009. Acorn crop size and pre-dispersal predation determine inter-specific differences in the recruitment success of two coexisting oaks. Oecologia, 161: 559-568
